story.text: I have been interviewed many times. I appreciate thoughtful questions and try my best to respond in kind. These days I mostly write in wiki and will do so for the [[Programmer Magazine Interview]] hosted on this site.

I was once interviewed via Google Wave. The questions were personal and still respectful. I enjoyed the process. The medium seemed especially good for interacting asynchronously. This has been lost, of course.

story.title: Ward Cunningham
story.text: I wrote [[Federated Wiki]] while I served as Nike's open-data fellow. I currently work for [[NewRelic]] in Portland, Oregon.
